en: Dominique sends you an e-mail filled with instructions on how to conduct oneself online and during interviews. He requests you look over it so you can prevent social media disasters from occurring on launch.
You feel a bit silly about it. You're not a celebrity, after all. What should you do?
You look over the material. It seems like it'll take a lot of practice to be able to protect yourself from making a silly mistake, but the future of your company depends on this.
You ignore the packet. Surely you'll be able to do this work when it's pertinent. For now, there's no point in wasting time on it.
